timeSeriesQuery.timeSeriesQueryLanguage: { fetch k8s_pod::kubernetes.io/anthos/vm_cpu_ready_seconds | align rate(1m) | add[cluster_name: if(re_full_match(resource.namespace_name, 'kube-system'), resource.cluster_name, resource.namespace_name), ]| every 1m | group_by [resource.project_id, cluster_name, resource.location, metric.node], [value_vm_cpu_ready_seconds_aggregate: aggregate(value.vm_cpu_ready_seconds)]; fetch k8s_container::kubernetes.io/anthos/kube_node_status_capacity | filter (metric.resource == 'cpu') | every 1m | add[cluster_name: resource.cluster_name ] | group_by [resource.project_id, resource.location, cluster_name, metric.node], [value_kube_node_status_capacity_cpu_cores_aggregate: aggregate(value.kube_node_status_capacity)] } | join | div | mul (100)

{ fetch k8s_pod::'kubernetes.io/anthos/vm_virtualdisk_read_latency_seconds' | align rate(1m) | every 1m | group_by [resource.project_id, resource.cluster_name, resource.location, metric.node],  [value_vm_virtualdisk_read_latency_seconds_sum: sum(value.vm_virtualdisk_read_latency_seconds)] ; fetch k8s_pod::'kubernetes.io/anthos/vm_number_virtualdisk' | every 1m | group_by [resource.project_id, resource.cluster_name, resource.location, metric.node], [value_vm_number_virtualdisk_sum: sum(value.vm_number_virtualdisk)] } | join | div

{ fetch k8s_pod::'kubernetes.io/anthos/vm_virtualdisk_write_latency_seconds' | align rate(1m) | every 1m | group_by [resource.project_id, resource.cluster_name, resource.location, metric.node], [value_vm_virtualdisk_write_latency_seconds_sum: sum(value.vm_virtualdisk_write_latency_seconds)] ; fetch k8s_pod::'kubernetes.io/anthos/vm_number_virtualdisk' | every 1m | group_by [resource.project_id, resource.cluster_name, resource.location, metric.node], [value_vm_number_virtualdisk_sum: sum(value.vm_number_virtualdisk)] } | join | div
